text: The results suggest that ( i ) there is a substantial burden of disease associated with exposures through inhalation taking place indoors and that ( ii ) these risks can Largest health benefits were projected for the source control policies . It is obvious that the benefits are achievable only if the source controls work as efficiently as proposed and that the efficiency of the source controls must be confirmed with follow - up ( e . g . auditing ) of exposure levels after the policy enforcement .
